system.description: When you mark a building with your signs or sigils, roll with SPIRIT.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, your attempt to claim the building awakens a sleeping or passive threat you had not considered; the MC will tell you who you angered with your impulsive claim.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, you lay claim to the location for the next few days.

On a 7-9, pick 1. At any distance, you can:

  • sense who is in the building at all times
  • control the doors, locks, and windows
  • conceal the building’s location or true function

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, you lay claim to the location for the next few days.

On a 10+, all 3. At any distance, you can:

  • sense who is in the building at all times
  • control the doors, locks, and windows
  • conceal the building’s location or true function
